mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Church, Alonzo H.
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Springfield, Sangamon Co., Ill [Springfield, Sangamon County, Illinois]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Church, Alonzo H. Patient Age: 23. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Convalescent from typhoid fever. Paroled prisoner from Willmington North Carolina in Camp Florence. 9 months!. Treatment: Paroled Prisoner. Result: Furloughed to Camp Chase 1865/04/03.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Church, Alonzo H.
Convalescent from typhoid fever. Paroled prisoner from Willmington North Carolina in Camp Florence. 9 months!
D Sgt [Drill Sergeant]
G
114th Ill Inf [114th Illinois Volunteer Infantry]
Illinois
Hospital Number 5546
